ygData.subject: Re: Patch downtime again this morning (Thursday)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To fix bugs from the previous patch?  :_) ... It s sold in both Freeport and Qeynos.  You can get it at Qeynos in Fireprides, next to the bank, but it s
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 14 Oct 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> Anyone know what the purpose of today's patch is yet?

To fix bugs from the previous patch? :_)

> I also have a question, I finally have some plat saved up to where I can
> begin to buy some steel armor to replace my ugly bronze until I can start
> moving forward to Lambent so does anyone know if I can find size "medium"
> steel plate armor for sale in either Freeport or Qeynos? I know it is sold
> in Kelethin but I am not sure if you can find it at these other cities.

It's sold in both Freeport and Qeynos. You can get it at
Qeynos in Fireprides, next to the bank, but it's horribly
overpriced there (like twice the normal cost). It may be a
wood elf thing as the merchant there originally wouldn't talk
to me. I get the standard minimum price (787.25pp for a
breastplate) in East Freeport.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
